name: Kitz Pro Liquid Laundry Detergent
description: Kitz Pro Liquid Laundry Detergent is a concentrated detergent designed for washing all types of textiles at all types of temperature. Effective washing from 30Â°C without the need for pre-washing, softness of the linen and respect for the skin by the selection of perfumes minimizing the risks of sensitization. Fragrance-free laundry detergent is hypoallergenic. Ready to use. 99% ingredients of natural origin.
